file_content.text: I really don't have a moment to chat with a messenger, good day.
Another gift? Hah! Savorin must be desperate for my good opinion. If there is nothing else, I have duties to attend to.
Excuse me, I don't have time to speak with you at the moment.
Doing your part for the war effort? Don't hesitate to ask if you need anything.
Are you here for an inspection? I assure you everything is in order here.
